prompts: Create a large, sleepy Pokémon that loves to nap in sunny meadows.
Imagine a Pokémon that is known for its massive size and gentle nature.
Design a creature that has a round body and a laid-back personality.
Show me a Pokémon that is always hungry and loves to eat berries.
